h1_title: How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss
h2_title: How to Summon the Shigandang Boss
content: Once you have all six Buddha Eyeballs (and have not defeated the Stone Vanguard on your own), you can interact with the large rock before engaging the Stone Vanguard to summon the Shigandang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Defeat_the_Stone_Vanguard_With_Another_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Defeat the Stone Vanguard With Another Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Summon the Shigandang Boss'.
The content is as follows:
Once you have all six Buddha Eyeballs (and have not defeated the Stone Vanguard on your own), you can interact with the large rock before engaging the Stone Vanguard to summon the Shigandang.
